item.title: Workspace setup ideas
item.description: Matthew Encina’s setup (2020, 2021) Peg board for wires and other such accessories Shelf with doors to remove visible clutter Monitor arm mount for easier monitor use Felt foot-rest Desk mat for keyboard and mouse Notepad, not notebook David Zhang Foot stool
item.content:
Matthew Encina’s setup (2020, 2021)

  1. Peg board for wires and other such accessories
  2. Shelf with doors to remove visible clutter
  3. Monitor arm mount for easier monitor use
  4. Felt foot-rest
  5. Desk mat for keyboard and mouse
  6. Notepad, not notebook

David Zhang

  1. Foot stool

item.title: The Macaroni in 'Yankee Doodle' Is Not What You Think - Atlas Obscura
